problem.markdown:
1. In forced vibrations usually the following are considered for analysis
(x) Steady State Vibrations () Transient Vibrations () Free Vibrations () None of these
2. What is the amplitude of force due to imbalance mass of 10g at a distance of 10mm rotating at 100rad/s (~950rpm) ?
() None of these () 10N () 0.1N (x) 1N
3. Which of the following is a forced vibration system?
() Wind blowing at tree top () Ocean waves at offshore rig (x) All of these () Car moving on a rough road
problem.p: 1. In forced vibrations usually the following are considered for analysis
2. What is the amplitude of force due to imbalance mass of 10g at a distance of 10mm rotating at 100rad/s (~950rpm) ?
3. Which of the following is a forced vibration system?

choicegroup.choice: Car moving on a rough road
